mods.abstract: Female child, Ella Cinders Doll, composition head on cloth body, composition arms and limbs, jointed at shoulders and hips, molded and painted features and hair, white all-in-one underwear, blue floral print knee length dress has flat round collar, back opening, black flat sole shoes with instep, knitted socks, company label, ELLA CINDERS, HORSMAN DOLL, manufactured doll body, underwear, hand-made, dress is hand and machine-made. Accompanying information describes that this doll was popular for a short time.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
